comments.en:
appears to be same as Acer 506G11 also Citizen ProLaser 600, Minolta SP-6, Epson 5200, only partial function - ok for text/ASCII, some graphics, but HP PJL not supported. still resolving - watch this space. Is a 3rd party product which is OEM badged, even by Epson ! (who don't make it)

Consumables/Refills: UKP110+ (sterling) - v.high cost
